overview.en: Shine Layer 2 (SHT) is a universal Token issued by Shine Chain Foundation for the Layer 2 scenario in the global insurance industry. It focuses on the ecological construction of global insurance data interaction, insurance anti-fraud and personal credit information system; it builds the interconnection between public blockchain and DAPP applications in the above areas, and promotes the application of block chain technology in the insurance field.
overview.zh: ShineLayer2（简称：SHT）是ShineChain基金会发行的应用于全球保险业Layer2场景的通用Token，专注于全球保险数据交互、保险反欺诈和个人征信体系的生态搭建；营造公链和DAPP应用在上述领域中的互联互通，促进区块链技术在保险领域的应用落地。
